name: White Cell Rampage
description:
You exist to engulf. The viruses have come to invade. You must consume the viruses to protect the bloodstream, or watch as your body is destroyed by the invaders. But these pathogens aren't the only bugs lying around. See if you can spot all of the glitches in this three hour game!

Controls:

  • Move up: Up arrow/W
  • Move down: Down arrow/S

Credits:

  • Stunning art assets by Adwen
  • Mind-bending scripting by Mangelo
  • Sound Effects/Music created with Chrome Music Lab's Song Maker
